message: AHHHHHHHHHHHHH there's an ape in the building!!! Oh...Topo. I'm so sorry sir, I didn't recognize you.
action1: I just got off my shift at McDegens.

message: We stocked up on perfectly ripe bananas for you to enjoy as you peruse the gallery today.
Woah, I almost lost a finger!
action1: Let's get to it, shall we?
